title: Skin ideas in celebration of star wars. Dianna Vader and more.
body:
An ideal theme song for the event or an idea of how the theme song could sound like.
https://soundcloud.com/celldweller/the-imperial-march

Skins:
1. Dianna Vader - Basically how it sounds like.
2. Chewbaccakong (Wukong)
3. Boba Vayne
4. Yasuo Dooku
5. Fiora Kenobi
6. Trooper Jhin
7. Yoda Gnar
8. Skywalker Riven

Weird skins ideas:
This one is just for some really confusing concepts I came up with.
1. Hana Quinn - Completly stupid, but why not. Valor is the millennium falcon and Quinn basically a female version of Han Solo.
2. Jabba Ornn - Hehe, I would love that.
3. Kylo Kassadin - Just because his void sword looks like his. Meh.
4. Leia Caitlyn - Hm, would be odd.

LET ME HEAR YOU! GIVE ME YOU FUNNIEST STAR WARS SKIN IDEA! XD

Hope they are good, GL HF. ;)

replies.body:
>Trooper Jhin
Wont work unless they give him permanent Teemo blind.
If anyone, then Kassadin should be Vader. He even has the breathing sound.
Jabba should most definitely be Tahm; both enjoy food and lavish styles of living.

While great, Riot would prob get sued. Jedi Yi is a very subtle and trope. 

Graves can be the one eyed black dude from Rogue One easily.
Already have Chosen Yi as a nod towards Star Wars, why not more?
